Articles.Content:
hello everyone, I've been trying to make just a container of gasoline with Blender for a week, after doing it and placing it in gamedata, my part is well listed in the vab, I can place it but after I do not can't move it anymore!?, I tried to make several pieces and always the same thing,
I made the parts on blender 2.83 and on ksp 1.10, I just tried on ksp 1.9.1 and still the same problem, I specify that at the beginning I did not collide, then I did some one, but the problem persists,

 

I tried several "node_stack_bottom" and "node_stack_top" as well as "attachrules", nothing changes, could you help me I don't know what to do anymore
